com.cloudia.cloudia_android

Class SensorOverviewActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.cloudia.cloudia_android.BaseActivity
        • com.cloudia.cloudia_android.SensorOverviewActivity

  • public class SensorOverviewActivity
extends BaseActivity
    This is the activity for the overview of a sensor (when clicked in the list). It shows the last 5 measures and a graph for the variation of these measures. There is also the possibility to see all measures by this sensor by clicking on "show all".
